mapper.select: select u.id, u.password, u.name, u.address, to_char(u.birthday,'yyyy.mm.dd') birthday, u.mileage, u.total_use_mileage from users u, question q where u.id=q.id and q.q_no=#{value}
select q_no, thread, q_title, q_contents, to_char(q_regdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') q_regdate, q_parent_no, q_status from question where q_no=#{value}
mapper.insert:
select question_seq.currval from dual
insert into question(q_no, thread, q_title, q_contents, q_parent_no, q_status, id) values(question_seq.nextval, #{qNo}*100-1, #{qTitle}, #{qContents}, #{qNo},'답변',#{userVO.id})
mapper.update: update question set q_status='답변완료' where q_no=#{qNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from join_post where jp_progress = '3'

select jp.jp_no, jp.jp_title, jp.jp_imgdirectory, jp.jp_total_mileage, jp.jp_group_no, jp.jp_progress, ps.ps_no, ps.ps_name, pg.post_no, pg.post_name, u.id, u.name from join_post jp inner join users u on jp.id = u.id inner join progress_status ps on jp.jp_progress = ps.ps_no inner join post_group pg on jp.jp_group_no = pg.post_no where jp.jp_progress='3'
